entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is talking to Hagrid in a low voice. He asks how Hagrid is doing and if he is missing someone.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a person who is wearing a large flowery apron and carrying a sack of potatoes. He has an enormous boarhound named Fang.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who is talking to Harry and Ron. She looks stricken when Hagrid slams the door.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who is with Hermione and Harry. Fang attempts to lick his ears.

relationships.description: Harry talks to Hagrid in a low voice.
Hagrid interacts with Hermione when Fang jumps up at her.
Harry tries to contact Hagrid by knocking on the door.
Hagrid interacts with Ron when Fang jumps up at him.
